some games (for example super mario; but others also) after minimized to taskbar wont restore if mozilla firefox is runing as a maximized window... my addons are status bar and adblockplus(and for short period downthem all- download manager)

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1.open some games (super mario for example)
2.mozilla must run before in maximized mode
3.minimize the game and fail to restore untill removing the full screen web broswing
Actual Results:  
allready sayd

Expected Results:  
shoudnt cause problems :) ?
comments.creator: angus_4@net.hr
